title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Functional Analysis Bounded linear operators on Banach and Hilbert spaces, self-adjoint and normal operators, compact operators, Fredholm alternatives, Eigen-values and eigen vectors, spectrum, spectral theory, Banach algebra of bounded linear opertors, unbounded operators, nonlinear operators, monotone, strictly monotone and strongly monotone operators.
